GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article with the specified ID

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments from the article with the specified ID

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a new comment to the specified article and responds with the successfully posted new comment

exampleRequest.body: This is my first comment, and the first comment on this article! First²!
exampleRequest.author: icellusedkars

newComment.body: This is my first comment, and the first comment on this article! First²!
newComment.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes on the specified article by the amount given in the request and responds with the successfully updated article

updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment with the specified ID and responds with no content upon successful deletion
